snippet: A 22-year-old motorist on the Grand Central Parkway was killed when an officer shot him after a predawn traffic stop. His passengers included an off-duty police officer, who was asleep in the back seat.
abstract: A 22-year-old motorist on the Grand Central Parkway was killed when an officer shot him after a predawn traffic stop. His passengers included an off-duty police officer, who was asleep in the back seat.

headline.main: Unarmed Man Fatally Shot by Police on Queens Highway
